definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: copper, bronze (only poet.; cf. I. [[נְחשֶׁת]]);—´[[נ]] alw. abs.;—
copper produced from ore by melting Job 28:2.

copper, doubtless hardened with alloy, = bronze, as material of bow 2Sa 22:35 = Ps 18:35, Job 20:24; gates Is 45:2; fig. of strength Job 40:18 (bones of hippopotamus), cf. Job 41:19, Mic 4:13 (hoofs of Zion); of obstinate brow Is 48:4 (‖[[גִּיד]] [[בַּרְזֶל עָרְפְֶָּ]]); unproductive earth Le 26:19.
